titles: An Answer to a book intituled, The doctrine and discipline of divorce, or, A plea for ladies and gentlewomen, and all other maried [sic] women against divorce wherein both sexes are vindicated from all bonadge [sic] of canon law, and other mistakes whatsoever ...
publisher: Printed by G.M. for William Lee ...,
notes: An attack on Milton's pamphlet, to which he replied in his Colasterion.
This work appears on reels 7 and 231.
Reproduction of originals in the Huntington Library and the Thomason Collection, British Library.
keywords: Milton, John, 1608-1674. --  Doctrine and discipline of divorce.
